original:
Do you wish to surrender unconditionally? $COUNTRY$ will have $MONTHS|Y$ months to send us a peace offer which will be automatically accepted. If they do not send one, there will be increasingly severe Calls for Peace in their country.

Our armies that are in our home provinces will be exiled and thus protected once we do this.

Control of all provinces currently owned and controlled by us will be transferred to the enemy.

一旦我们投降，我国在境内省份的军队将进入流亡状态，从而得到保护。

现时我国拥有、控制的所有省份都将被转交由敌国控制。

original: Restore the Roman Empire

original: Not since the Romans in the second century has one empire commanded the entirety of the Mediterranean and beyond. If we claim this land, we can scoff at whatever pretenders may claim in Constantinople or the Holy Roman Empire and proclaim ourselves the true successors of Rome.
translation: 自公元二世纪的罗马之后，就再没有任何一个帝国能够执掌整个地中海及其周边地区。如果我们宣称这片土地，我们可以对君士坦丁堡或神圣罗马帝国的那群假货所宣称的一切嗤之以鼻，并宣告世人：我们才是罗马真正的继承人。

original: The Vast and Endless Sea
translation: 广阔无垠之海

original: Unlike the calling to the battlefields of land, a matter of duty and search for glory, the sea calls to many free spirits who care little for such things. Stories of sailing the oceans of the world and the past expeditions of the [Root.GetAdjective] fleet are retold by old sailors as adventures, many of the great sights remembered, many of the great sacrifices forgotten.\n\nIs it any wonder, with such a legacy, that the youths of [Root.GetName] yearn for the vastness of the sea? Many more have come to join our navy over the past year. Some may end their lives at the bottom of the ocean, but those who return are sure to keep the stories alive.
translation: 陆地上的战事是对责任和义务的呼唤，也是对荣耀的求索；而大海，则是在召唤那些对这些东西毫不在乎的自由的灵魂。[Root.GetAdjective]舰队那些纵横七海的故事和曾经的远征被老水手们当做冒险经历一遍遍讲述着，无数壮丽的奇景被世人永远铭记，还有无数伟大的牺牲被世人渐渐遗忘。\n\n聆听着这样的传奇故事，无数的[Root.GetName]青年对浩渺汪洋的向往岂非顺理成章？在过去的一年中，许多人前来加入我国海军，其中一些不免会长眠于海底，但成功返航者必定能将那些传奇故事延续下去。

original: We write the legacy that inspires future generations.
translation: 我们书写着激励后代的传奇。

original: Harsh Life on the Ocean
translation: 海上苦旅

original: Many join the ranks of our navy expecting a more exciting life awaiting them with this opportunity to leave their home behind and see sea and land beyond the [Root.GetAdjective] borders. Not all of these are prepared for an often harsh and even more often dull and boring life at sea. Stuck with endlessly repetitive tasks, food and company on longer journeys, many young sailors quickly regret their decision.\n\nDismissed as daydreaming landlubbers by their more seasoned crewmates, they quickly become more trouble than they're worth. Some might eventually grow used to the reality of the job and become useful, but others do more good returning home.
translation: 许多人加入我国海军，是期盼着能够离家远航，见识[Root.GetAdjective]之外的海洋与土地，过上更为惊险刺激的日子。并非所有人都做好了准备，应付这时常艰苦、更多时候则是沉闷无趣的海上生活。受困于长途旅程中不停重复的工作、食物和同伴，不少年轻水手很快就对他们的决定感到后悔了。\n\n被前辈的同侪们斥为“做白日梦的旱鸭子”，这些人造成的麻烦很快超过了他们所能奉献的价值。其中一些可能终将接受现实并成长为优秀的水手，但让其他人回家会更好。

original: Recruitment propaganda has its downsides.
translation: 征兵宣传总会有些负面效应。

original: Sailors Rally to Aid Army
translation: 集结水手支援陆军

original: Our army has endured severe casualties over the past years, with thousands of lives lost in battle. Meanwhile, those who serve [Root.GetName] at sea have not suffered the same fate. Despite the sacrifices they've made to protect our nation, the ranks of our navy do not lack for hands on deck.\n\nAs a result, the navy has begun to encourage those willing to risk their life at sea to aid our ailing land troops instead. After all, if there's no one to protect our ports, even our best ships and crews will have nowhere to dock.
translation: 近年来，我国陆军承受了严重的伤亡，成千上万的士兵在战斗中牺牲。与此同时，[Root.GetName]旗下的海军并未遭受同样的命运。尽管海军各部也为我国防务做出了牺牲，但他们并不缺乏预备兵员。\n\n正是因此，海军已经开始鼓励那些希望在海上奋战的人转去支援困境中的我国陆军。毕竟，如果没人保卫港口的话，即使是我们最优秀的舰船和海员也将无处可泊。

original: New recruits must go where they are needed.
translation: 新兵必须去任何需要他们的地方。

original: Soldiers Rally to Aid Navy
translation: 集结士兵支援海军

original: In recent conflicts, many lives have been lost at sea. While our army has recovered well, captains find it difficult to recruit crews for [Root.GetAdjective] ships, and many bitter tales have been told all the way up to the court of [Root.Monarch.GetName] about the sacrifices our navy made.\n\nIncreasingly, army leaders have paid heed to this, encouraging those who could have served within their ranks to travel to the coast and man our ships instead. Although they may have much yet to learn, their help will be needed for the navy to recover.
translation: 在近期的冲突中，许多生命都殒于大海。现今我国的陆军已经恢复了元气，但海军船长们却在为[Root.GetAdjective]的舰船招募海员时面临了困境。许多苦涩的故事开始流传，讲述着我国海军所做的牺牲，甚至传入了[Root.Monarch.GetName]的宫廷中。\n\n渐渐地，陆军将领们留意到了这一情况，并开始鼓励那些准备在陆军中服役的人转而前往海边操控舰船。尽管他们可能尚有许多需要学习的东西，他们的帮助依然会使海军的恢复受益良多。

original: A Path to the Sea
translation: 通向海洋之路

original: Although [Root.GetName] does not have the seafaring culture of many coastal nations, we nevertheless take pride in the short strip of land that provides us with access to the sea. The [Root.GetAdjective] coast provides many opportunities and draws many hopeful young visitors looking for a new life.\n\nAlthough our naval capacity is limited, having more young people with experience in boatmanship would bolster the crews of our ships. Perhaps we could help these sailor hopefuls to settle in their new home?
translation: 虽然[Root.GetName]并没有如许多沿海国家那般发达的航海文化，但我们还是自豪于拥有一小块接邻大海的土地。[Root.GetAdjective]海岸提供了许多机遇，也吸引了不少满怀希望的年轻人前来此处寻找新生。\n\n虽然我国海军规模有限，但拥有更多掌握航行技术的年轻人能够大幅提升船员的能力。也许我们可以给这些未来的水手们找个新家？

original: Their ambitions should be encouraged.
translation: 他们的抱负值得鼓励。

original: They'll grow tired with the sea soon enough.
translation: 他们用不了多久就会厌恶海洋的。

original: Rise of the Maroserana
translation: 马鲁塞拉纳的崛起

original: We do not know exactly who they are or where they came from. A new ruling class has emerged and begun to transform [Root.GetAdjective] society. Known as the Maroserana, they may have arrived from the mainland, but local [Root.Culture.GetName] practices and religion are integral to how they maintain power. By venerating rulers of the past and having the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] appoint mediums communicating with ancestors, they tie their own reign to the entire history of [Root.GetName]. Combined with more formalized contact with important partners, craftsmen and scientists throughout the nation, the new practices introduced by the Maroserana are likely to benefit our nation.
translation: 我们并不清楚他们究竟是谁，又来自哪里。一个新的统治阶级已经兴起并开始改变[Root.GetAdjective]社会，这些人以马鲁塞拉纳之名为世人所知。他们可能来自于大陆，但本地的[Root.Culture.GetName]习俗与宗教却是其维持统治地位的重要基础。通过敬拜先代的统治者并由[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]钦定与祖灵沟通的司祭，他们将本族的统治与整个[Root.GetName]的历史紧紧相连。通过更正式的交流与全国的重要盟友、匠人和学者结合了起来，马鲁塞拉纳所推行的这些新体制看来是有利于我国的。

original: The rulers and the people learn from each other.
translation: 统治者和人民要互相学习。

original: Transcribe the Ibonia
translation: 抄录《伊波尼亚》

original: Of the many stories told among our people, the Ibonia is one of the most widespread. Describing the life of the hero Iboniamasiboniamanoro and his adventures to save his betrothed Iampelasoamananoro, many different versions of it are told throughout [Root.GetName].\n\nWhile we take pride in the way these stories have been retold throughout the ages, the Ibonia is largely unknown abroad. To spread our stories over the world, we will have to put them into writing. However, this will inevitably force us to select a definite version, most likely the one retold in [Root.Capital.GetName]. Those who grew up with other variants of the story may lose faith in [Root.Monarch.GetName]. Is it worth the risk?
translation: 在我们民族代代口述的许多故事中，伊波尼亚史诗是最广为流传的一个。它描述了英雄伊波尼亚马西波尼亚马诺罗的一生以及他拯救其婚约者伊安姆培拉索阿玛那诺罗的历险，在[Root.GetName]之地上流传着诸多不同的版本。\n\n虽说我们为伊波尼亚史诗流传数个世纪而自豪，但它并不为海外所知。为了将我们的史诗传遍世界，我们需要把它用文字记录下来。不可避免的是，我们必须要明确地选定一个版本，而流传在[Root.Capital.GetName]的版本则最有可能获选。但自幼便聆听伊波尼亚史诗其他版本的人可能因此而对[Root.Monarch.GetName]感到失望。值得冒这个险吗？

original: The Ibonia must be printed and spread across the world.
translation: 伊波尼亚史诗必须印刷出来并传遍世界。

original: It will remain told with the many voices of the [Root.GetAdjective] people.
translation: 它将仍由[Root.GetAdjective]的无数人民来口口相传。

original: Soldiers Break Fady
translation: 士兵打破了禁忌

original: Fady, a concept of social and religious taboo, restrict behavior in Malagasy society and is often difficult for outsiders to grasp. Our troops in Malagasy lands have sometimes found themselves ostracized by locals due to their inability to follow these rules, but has avoided causing serious offense. Recently, however, some of them accidentally set up a camp in an area declared to be fady to even enter without being properly prepared.\n\nUnlike previous incidents, locals have been seriously concerned about this contravention and taken the matter to a higher instance, making this a diplomatic incident. How should we handle this situation?
translation: “法蒂”作为一个社会文化性及宗教性禁忌的概念，对马拉加什社会中人们的行为举止作出了限制。而对外来者来说，其间的分寸往往难以把握。我们在马拉加什的士兵常常因没能遵守这些规矩而受到当地人的排斥，不过好在没引起过严重的问题。然而，近期一些士兵却无意间闯进一个“法蒂”区扎下了营地。据称，没有经过完善的准备，甚至连进入此地都是严格禁止的。\n\n与以往情况不同，当地人将此事看得非常严重，甚至将状况升级为了一个外交问题。我们该如何处理这一情况？

original: Dismiss it as an absurd superstition.
translation: 将其视作荒诞的迷信而打发掉。

original: Issue an apology for our ignorance of local customs.
translation: 为我们对当地习俗的无知表示道歉。

original: [From.GetAdjective] Visitors Break Fady
translation: [From.GetAdjective]来访者打破禁忌

original: The social rules and taboos we call fady are important across [Root.GetName], but many of them are defined locally. Our administration accommodates this and in fact, respecting and allowing these local variations is part of the policy making communities loyal to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].\n\nSome of the soldiers from [From.GetName] crossing our country have displayed a much more careless behavior and seriously broken local fady. What is worse, they have refused to apologize and hypocritically called our customs superstitious, while maintaining social and religious rules themselves which they seem to have no such reservations about. This is nothing short of an insult against our people.
translation: 被我族人民奉为“法蒂”的社会文化性法规和禁忌对整个[Root.GetName]而言都极为重要，但不少内容都只是本地性的规矩。我们的行政部门已经试着迁就这一点，事实上，尊重并允许一些地方习俗是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]收买各部族忠心的政策的一部分。\n\n一些来自[From.GetName]的士兵在穿越我国领土时却表现得毫不在意且严重违反了当地忌讳。更糟的是，他们拒绝道歉并矫情地称我们的习俗是迷信，而他们自己却也保留着社会文化和宗教方面的传统——看起来他们对自家的文化就没有这些偏见。这只能认定为是对我国人民的侮辱。

original: Such slights can't go unchallenged.
translation: 不能将其置之不理。

original: Lukasa
translation: 卢卡莎

original: To maintain our history and knowledge, the wise artisans of [Root.GetName] have created lukasa, memory boards, to chronicle everything from genealogies to maps. A complex system of carvings and beads on the boards serves as a mnemonic, helping historians to recall and recite the past.\n\n$ARTIST$ has grown particularly adept in the art of creating the lukasa, and this opportunity to store knowledge for the future must be seized before this brilliant artist leaves our employ. What should we immortalize?
translation: 为了延续我们的历史和知识，[Root.GetName]的能工巧匠们制作了“卢卡莎”即记事板，用来记录包括族谱和地图在内的一切信息。这是一个由板子上的雕刻和珠子构成的复杂系统，能够作为助记符帮助史学家们回忆并传述过去。\n\n$ARTIST$制作卢卡莎的技艺可谓炉火纯青，我们必须在这位艺术家离去前紧紧抓住这个贮藏知识的机会。我们该铭记什么内容？

original: The laws of our administration.
translation: 我们的行政法律。

original: Our trade routes and partners.
translation: 我们的商路和贸易伙伴。

original: Our greatest warriors.
translation: 我们最伟大的战士。

original: The ancestry of the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] clan.
translation: [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]一族的先祖们。

original: Expand the Mbudye
translation: 拓展姆布迪埃

original: The power of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has always been balanced by the influence of the Mbudye, a council of men and women of spiritual and historical knowledge. Some of the most influential elders in the council have recently passed away, leaving [Root.Monarch.GetName] with less guidance than the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has usually enjoyed.\n\nFortunately, many younger promising candidates are prepared to step in, having proved themselves in the art of reading memory boards and understanding the old traditions and stories. Should we allow them to quickly ascend to join the Mbudye to retain the council's position of influence?
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]所握的权力一直受姆布迪埃的影响力所制衡。姆布迪埃是一个长老会，成员往往懂得通灵或者历史知识。近来，长老会中一些最具影响力的长者溘然长逝，使得[Root.Monarch.GetName]只能得到[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]日常所获的指导和引领的一部分。\n\n辛运的是，很多更加年轻且前途光明的候选人已经准备好加入姆布迪埃，而且他们也都证明了自己在解读记事板和理解旧传统与故事的能力。我们是否该允许他们早些上位、加入姆布迪埃以保证长老会的影响力？

original: Allow the young candidates to join.
translation: 允许年轻候选者们加入。

original: Push through reforms while the council is weak.
translation: 趁长老会虚弱时推进改革。

original: Mbudye Clashes with [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: 姆布迪埃与[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]发生冲突

original: Since we decided to expand the Mbudye council, some decisions have been met with opposition. It seems the new members brought with them new interpretations of our history and laws, which has led to the cooperation between the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and the council becoming strained and [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s wisdom being called into question.\n\nThe council's approval is crucial to how [Root.GetName] is ruled, and a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] choosing to ignore their advice would significantly hurt [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] credibility. How should we resolve this conflict?
translation: 自从我们决定扩大姆布迪埃长老会后，一些决策问题遭到了反对。看起来长老会新成员对我们的历史和法律有新的解读，导致[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]与长老会间的合作变得紧张，而[Root.Monarch.GetName]的智慧也受到质疑。\n\n长老会的决策对[Root.GetName]的治理至关重要，而任何一位选择忽视其意见的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]会显著影响到[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]信誉。我们该怎么解决这一冲突？

original: Ignore the new council members.
translation: 忽视长老会新成员。

original: Concede that the council knows best.
translation: 承认长老会的决策是最优的。

original: Generational Conflict in Mbudye
translation: 姆布迪埃发生世代冲突

original: Our decision to make some relatively young additions to the Mbudye, the governing council, has led to conflicts between members. The new councilors, although inquisitive and eager to learn at first, have now begun to argue about how to read the memory boards and questioning details of important pieces of information recalled by the oldest members.\n\nAlthough it's possible that the old generation is going senile, the insolence displayed by the newcomers suggesting this is staggering. Should the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] silence them or heed their advice?
translation: 我们将一些较年轻的成员引入姆布迪埃长老会的决策导致其成员间出现了冲突。新长老们虽然最开始时还谦虚受教，但现在已然开始对解读记事板的方法提出了异议，并开始质问由老一辈长老们所诠释的重要信息片段的细节。\n\n虽然长者们确实可能有些年老昏聩了，但新入成员所展现的无礼还是令人震惊。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]应该禁止他们的发言还是听取其意见？

original: The elders' memories have never failed us.
translation: 诸位长者的记忆从未令我们失望过。

original: The new interpretations will determine the future.
translation: 新的诠释将会决定未来。

original: Antonio Fernandes
translation: 安东尼奥·费尔南德斯

original: A man has come from the coast. He calls himself a Portuguese exile, a "degregado." He has a gift for languages, and says he has been working as a translator at one of the settlements on the coast that we do trade with. Now he wishes to explore the interior, and discover the source of the gold trade along the coast.\nWe have no reason to distrust this man, but the greedy Portuguese traders are another matter.
translation: 有个人从海岸那边过来了。他称自己为一个葡萄牙流亡者，一个「流放者」。他很有语言天赋，自称在某个与我们有贸易往来的沿岸殖民地做翻译。现在他想要探索内陆地区，寻找在海岸地带进行贸易的黄金来源。\n我们没有理由怀疑此人，但贪婪的葡萄牙商人是另一回事。

original: We will treat our guest as a guest.
translation: 我等将以待客之道招待客人。

original: The Portuguese are not to be trusted.
translation: 葡萄牙人难以信任。

original: Increased Trade with India
translation: 增长的印度贸易

original: When the Europeans first settled along the coast, they seemed to set off into the unknown as often as they could. Now however, ships have started returning as well. They bring spices and fabrics we can trade for, and the Europeans are more than eager for our gold and ivory. This way the Europeans have given us a much more efficient ways of trading with the distant lands of India.
translation: 当欧洲人一开始在沿海地区落脚时，他们总是在竭尽全力地探索未知区域。而现在，他们的船也常常返航了。欧洲人带来我们需要的香料和布料，他们自己则异常渴望获得我们手中的黄金和象牙。如此一来，欧洲人为我们提供了一个更为高效的方式与远方的印度大陆进行交易。

original: We should demand more for our goods.
translation: 我们应该为自己的商品争取更多好处。

original: Send as much to India as the European ships can carry!
translation: 尽可能塞满任何前往印度的欧洲货船！

original: Descended from the Same Breast
translation: 一乳同胞

original: As our mothers' lineages determine our inheritance and our right to rule, it also links us back to our common mother. The tribes and families of $COUNTRY$ will avoid so much infighting and quarreling, if we could always keep in mind the simple creed of our people. We are all descended from the same breast.
translation: 来自母系的血脉决定了我们的继承权和统治权，也使我们能够回溯到同一位母亲。如果我们的人民能够记住这一简单的信条，$COUNTRY$的各个部落和家族将能够避免无数内讧和争斗。我们都源于同一条血脉。

original: In peace, $COUNTRY$.
translation: $COUNTRY$长治久安。

original: The Land of Flames
translation: 烈焰之地

original: For generations and generations, Maravi has been renowned for its ironworks. Fields of open-ground furnaces have given us our name, "the Land of Flames."\nNow that our enemy draws near, it is time to fan those flames, and show them that our furnaces are not just for tools and nails, but also for knives and spears!
translation: 马拉维以其炼铁业而世代闻名。露天锻炉给予了我族之名——「烈焰之地」。\n现今敌人逐渐逼近，是时候鼓风燃火，让他们知道我们的锻炉不仅用于冶炼工具和钉子，也能锻造出刀剑与长矛！

original: Our iron will scorch the enemy from this land.
translation: 我族钢铁将烧尽这片土地上的敌人。

original: The Chewa
translation: 切瓦人

original: The Chewa came from the distant west, and settled with our ancestors here. When, our elders do not remember, but they tell tales of their secret languages and the markings on their skin. Even now we honor those markings, for as the Chewa became a part of us, we became a part of them. Whether you are Banda or Phiri, you don their masks and listen to their wisdom.
translation: 切瓦人来自遥远的西方，与我们的祖先一同定居于此。此为何时，我族长者已然无法回忆，但他们仍能讲述关于切瓦族神秘的语言和涂在皮肤上的纹案之事。如今我们尊崇这些纹案，因切瓦人已然是我族同胞，而我族亦为切瓦人的同胞。不论你是来自班达部落还是菲里部落，你都将带上他们的面具并聆听先祖的智慧。

original: We listen.
translation: 我们听着。

original: Nyau Secret Societies
translation: 尼欧秘社

original: To an outsider it looks like whispers behind their back, strange rituals at night, and esoteric initiation ceremonies. To us, it is the natural spread of knowledge, understanding and history. Every young man and woman in every village is brought into a Nyau society, where they learn and share an understanding of the world. This will guide them through their lives, and form a bond with societies in other villages through their rituals.
translation: 对一个外来者来说，这看起来像是背后的耳语，夜间进行古怪祭仪或是深奥玄妙的起始仪式。对我们来说，这是智识、认知和历史的自然传播方式。每个村子里的所有年轻男女都会被带到一个尼欧结社去学习并共享对世界的了解和认知。这将会引领他们度过一生，并通过这些祭仪与其他村庄的秘社形成联系。

original: It is the way of our people.
translation: 这是我们的习俗。

original: Forbid this nonsense!
translation: 禁止这些胡闹！

original: Remembering the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: 缅怀[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]

original: With the passing of the old [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] we need to decide how they will be remembered in the festival. As we let the eternal fire that has been burning since they took the throne fade, a great wooden animal, held aloft by a dozen men, will celebrate them. Through what creature will we remember the old, as we light a new fire for [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]?
translation: 在先代[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]逝世后，我们需要决定如何在祭典中缅怀他们。当我们让自其登基后便一直燃烧的永恒之火慢慢熄去时，一个由十二个人高举的大型木制动物图腾将用于祭奠他们。而当我们为下任[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]点燃新的火焰时，我们该用什么动物图腾来缅怀旧主？

original: Njobvu, the elephant, to remember their greatness.
translation: 大象，以纪念他们的伟大一生。

original: Ndondo, the snake, to remember how our homes were built.
translation: 长蛇，以缅怀我们的家园是如何建成的。

original: Kasiyamaliro, the antelope, to joyfully remember we all join our ancestors one day.
translation: 羚羊，来愉悦地祭奠我们终有一日会与祖先团圆。

original: Mkango, the lion, to remember that our ancestors must not be trifled with.
translation: 雄狮，以牢记不得轻慢先祖之名。

original: Cambarantama
translation: 坎巴兰坦玛

original: Ntare I Cambarantama was a legendary king and founder of Burundi, descendant of the ancient Ntwero clan, and the first Mwami of the first cycle of Burundian kings. Now, the cycle begins anew for the first time, with Ntare III Kivimira Savuyimba Semunganzashamba Rushatsi Cambarantama. \nBeing one with the beginning, he is the founder of a new era for all the clans of Burundi.
translation: 坎巴兰坦玛·恩塔尔一世是布隆迪的传奇君王，也是该王国的创建者，古老的恩提罗氏族的后裔，以及布隆迪诸王第一世代的首位姆瓦米。现今，这一世代交替将完成第一次轮回，新的轮回将自齐维米拉·萨乌印巴·瑟姆甘扎杉巴·卢沙奇·坎巴兰坦玛·恩塔尔三世而始。\n作为新世代的开启者，他将建立一个属于布隆迪各部的新纪元。

original: He is worthy of being the [Root.GetAdjective] [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 他完全适合成为[Root.GetAdjective]的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。

original: He would make an excellent advisor to [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName].
translation: 他将成为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]麾下的优秀顾问。

original: The Batembuzi of Kitara
translation: 基塔拉的拜特邦吉

original: Long before we ruled this land, almost from the beginning of the world, the ancient Empire of Kitara stretched across all the Great Lakes, under the reign of the Batembuzi. The Batembuzi dynasty was founded by none other than Ruhanga, the creator, and his descendants held divine powers. Many kingdoms have claimed to carry the heritage of ancient Kitara, and if we follow the lineage of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] back far enough, we might also find a drop of that divine blood.
translation: 早在我们统治这片土地之前，几乎可以追溯到世界起源之时，古老的齐塔拉帝国已然囊括了所有的大湖，并使其处于拜特邦吉的统治之下。拜特邦吉王朝的建立者正是卢昂加，即造物主，其后代则拥有神力。许多王国都宣称是古基塔拉的继承者，如果我们细细回溯[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]的血缘，我们也可能发现那神圣血脉在此一系的点滴关联。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] rules $COUNTRY$ with the authority of the Batembuzi.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]将以拜特邦吉的权威统治$COUNTRY$。

original: Ensure our neighbors are aware of [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s powerful lineage.
translation: 确保我们的邻国知晓[Root.Monarch.GetName]的伟大血脉。

original: We will restore the borders of old Kitara!
translation: 我们将重建古基塔拉的国境！

original: Exceptional Katikkiri
translation: 杰出的卡狄奇利

original: Ruling a chiefdom is hard work, and in the Kingdom of $COUNTRY$, each [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] rules with the aid of a Katikkiri. [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s Katikkiri has a hundred great ideas, and no shortage of plans for executing them.\nOur [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has been blessed to have such a talented minister serving him.
translation: 治理一个酋邦不是什么容易事，而在$COUNTRY$王国中，每位[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的统治都有一位卡狄奇利辅佐。[Root.Monarch.GetName]的卡狄奇利的脑子里充满了各种棒极了的想法，而且从不缺少将其化为现实的执行方案。\n我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]定是蒙神祝福，才会有如此天资卓越的大臣从旁辅佐。

original: The Katikkiri should work with our vassal tribes.
translation: 卡狄奇利应当处理与我们的附属部落间的事务。

original: The Katikkiri should work with our neighbors.
translation: 卡狄奇利应当处理与我们的邻国间的事务。

original: Kateregga Seizes the Throne
translation: 凯特雷加登上王位

original: There were whispers of witchcraft. How else could the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] have passed away so suddenly? Especially at such an opportune moment for Kateregga to claim the right of inheritance, even though he was the middle child of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s third wife. \nNevertheless, Kateregga is now ready to ascend to the throne.
translation: 定是有巫术邪神作祟，不然[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的逝去怎会如此突然？尤其是在如此巧合之时使得凯特雷加——尽管只是[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]第三任妻子所产的排行中间的孩子——能够宣称继承权？ \n无论如何，凯特雷加现已做好继承王位的准备了。

original: He is the rightful [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] of $COUNTRY$.
translation: 他是$COUNTRY$的正统[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。

original: This wicked man must never rule $COUNTRY$!
translation: 此等歹毒小辈绝不能统治$COUNTRY$！

original: Kateregga's Children
translation: 凯特雷加的孩子

original: Kateregga fathered a multitude of children, who would go on to establish the Kateregga clan across the land. With so many children to choose from, raised by so many wives, Kateregga took great care in selecting his rightful heir.
translation: 凯特雷加与其妻子们孕育了许多孩子，他们将会在各地建立起凯特雷加氏族。在有着由诸多妻妾所养育的这么多后代可选的情况下，凯特雷加非常小心谨慎地选择着他的继承人。

original: The eldest by his first wife.
translation: 首位妻子所生的长子。

original: The eldest by his second wife.
translation: 第二位妻子所生长子。

original: The youngest one, by his fifth wife.
translation: 由第五位妻子所生，最年幼的孩子。

original: Kateregga's End
translation: 凯特雷加之死

original: The people whispered of witchcraft in everything he did, and it might have been punishment from the spirits that caused Kateregga's end to come the way it did. A deadly centipede with a poisonous sting crawled up his leg. A jab to his loins, which had given the seed from which so many children had sprung. \nSome speak of his end as fitting, others as tragic.
translation: 人们在私下里将他所做的每件事都视为巫术，而今凯特雷加的此等结局似乎正是来自神灵们的惩罚。一只带有致命毒牙的蜈蚣沿着他的腿爬了上去，在他的会阴部咬了一口——正是那处播撒了无数种子、种出一众子女的地方。\n有人说他的死是老天开眼了，其他人则觉得这是个悲剧。

original: He left this world screaming more than when he entered it.
translation: 他离开这个世界时嚎得比他来时还要响。

original: §YYour Corruption is growing§!
translation: §Y你的腐败度正在增长§!

original: Left unchecked, high Corruption can ruin your country.
translation: 置之不理的话，高腐败度会毁掉你的国家。

original: §YYour Corruption is very high§!
translation: §Y你的腐败度非常高§!

original: Fraud and bribery are now hallmarks of your government. However expensive, you have to root it out!
translation: 欺诈和贿赂现已成为你的政府的标志。不论付出什么代价，你必须铲除腐败！

original: The Honest Merchants of [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]的诚信商人

original: While many traders are known for cheating countrymen and foreigners alike, lying about the quality of goods and making fraudulent promises, [Root.GetAdjective] merchants are well known to be trustworthy, if competitive. Although they may sometimes cut deals that benefit themselves and not their trade partners, they rarely lie or take bribes. This has made us the first choice of traders around the world.
translation: 许多商人都因无差别地欺诈同胞和外国人而知名，不仅谎报商品质量还做出虚假承诺；而[Root.GetAdjective]商人则以其相较之下的良好信誉而闻名于世。尽管他们有时也会在生意中占点便宜，但他们极少说谎或收取好处费。这使得我们成为世界上最受欢迎的贸易伙伴。

original: Why would we lie when we have the best offers?
translation: 能定下最好的协议的话，为什么还要说谎呢？

original: Trust Your Neighbor
translation: 相信你的邻居

original: Although citizens are encouraged to show trust and good faith in their exchanges, the reality in many nations is that it's a risk people cannot afford to take. This, however, is not the case in [Root.GetName]. We have successfully stamped out corruption on so many levels in society, people not only trust officials to do their jobs without the extra help of a bribe but they also trust each other more in general exchanges. This general belief in the honesty of others is the very thread from which the fabric of society is woven, and our country is a shining example of it.
translation: 尽管市民们常受到鼓励，要在交往中表现诚意和信任，但事实上在许多国家其间的风险都不是人们所能承受的。然而，在[Root.GetName]的情况却不是这样。我们已经成功地粉碎了社会各阶层的腐败，人民群众不仅信任官员、相信他们不需取得额外的贿赂便能完成工作，更多的还有在日常交往中的相互信任。这种相信他人诚意的广泛信念是构成整个社会关系网的基础，我们的国家正是这样一个耀眼的榜样。

original: As stipulated in [Root.Religion.GetName] teachings.
translation: 正如[Root.Religion.GetName]教义中所述。

original: Rigorous Researchers
translation: 严谨的研究者

original: Academic institutions are not immune to corruption, and the profits that can be made by abusing positions of great influence can stand in the way of creating a good environment for research. However, [Root.GetAdjective] scientists are largely above this, focusing on genuine intellectual achievements above titles and financial contributions. The lack of corruption in society allows us to explore and invent without being impeded by selfish interests.
translation: 学术机构也难免出现腐败，滥用高影响力的职权获取好处会严重干扰一个良好研究环境的形成。然而，[Root.GetAdjective]科学家们的觉悟早就超出了这些琐事，他们专注于学术成就而不是名誉和钱财。缺少腐败空气的社会使得我们能够进行探索和发明而不受私利束缚。

original: The search for knowledge must be valued in itself.
translation: 学术研究的真正价值在于其本身。

original: An Honorable People
translation: 可敬的民族

original: Few are the countries in the world who do not claim to value honor and justice, but even fewer are the countries who actually live up to these ideals. However, the lack of large-scale and everyday corruption in [Root.GetName] has made it one of these rare places where principles matter over personal gain. Even abroad, [Root.GetAdjective] expatriates are sought-after for positions of trust, as our people are known for adherence to duty and rejecting attempted bribes. Who else can claim to live up to these ideals?
translation: 不宣称重视荣誉和正义的国家可谓世间少有，真正做到这些信条的国家更少。然而，根除了大规模日常腐败使得[Root.GetName]成为了极少数几个视道德信条高于个人所得的地方之一。甚至在海外的[Root.GetAdjective]侨民也是炙手可热，并常受信赖而被任命于重要职位，毕竟我国人民恪守义务且拒绝贿赂的作风广为人知。除了我们，还有谁能宣称自己真正做到这些信条呢？

original: Few indeed.
translation: 确实不多。

original: Incorruptible
translation: 清正廉洁

original: Not everyone who aids the enemy knows the true nature of their transgression. Spies may be loyal to a foreign power, but many of their information sources are people who are simply paid well for telling secrets they shouldn't, without understanding who makes use of them. However, in [Root.GetName], corruption has been all but extinguished. Spies who recently tried to compromise our administration through bribery and extortion have found themselves reported instead of aided by our officials, and are now at our mercy.
translation: 不是所有的通敌者都能明白自己这一背叛行为究竟意味着什么。间谍或许是忠于外国势力的，但他们的线人却多为受金钱诱惑而泄露不该吐露的秘密、却不知道这些秘密会为谁所用的群众。然而，在[Root.GetName]腐败已经几乎完全消失了。近期，一些间谍试图通过贿赂和勒索损害我国行政机构，却发现自己并未受官员协助反而被检举，而现在他们正等候我们的发落。

original: Death to spies!
translation: 间谍们去死吧！

original: Corrupt Taxmen
translation: 腐败的税吏

original: Those who handle large sums of money have always been tempted to claim more than their share of it, and tax collectors are no exception. However, while money getting lost along the way may be a price we can afford to pay, affluent citizens have now found that they can avoid some taxes altogether by paying large bribes to taxmen instead. Currently this seems to be a scheme supported by some of the older collectors trying to retire comfortably. While it is costly, we might be able to avoid spending time and effort on a detailed investigation and just wait it out.
translation: 手握大量金钱之人总免不了想占些私利，税吏也是一样。然而，尽管我们能够承受税收过程中的损耗，富裕的公民却已经注意到可以通过向税吏支付大额贿赂来逃掉一些税务。现时来看，这更像是一些老税吏想要在退休后过上舒适生活而玩的小把戏。尽管代价略高，我们或许可以再等等看，而不用花费大量时间和精力去进行详细调查。

original: Investigate and replace them immediately.
translation: 立即调查并替换税吏。

original: Let them retire, they've served us well in the past.
translation: 让他们退休吧，他们过去干得很好。

original: Corrupt Advisor
translation: 腐败的顾问

original: [Root.GetName] may be plagued by corruption, but we try to ensure that those closest to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] can be trusted, at the very least. Try and fail, it seems, since one of [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s advisors was recently caught taking large bribes from people already wielding great influence in our country to provide the government with advice slanted to advance their interests. How shall we respond to this betrayal?
translation: [Root.GetName]内部可能正受着腐败问题的困扰，但我们仍试图确保至少[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]身边之人仍可信赖。看来这尝试是失败的，[Root.Monarch.GetName]的一位顾问近期被抓了个现行，因其接受了一位在国内呼风唤雨者的贿赂，此人希望这名顾问向政府提供有利于他们的建议。我们该如何处理这次背叛？

original: Publicly expose these lies and prepare an execution.
translation: 公开这些谎言并准备处刑。

original: Arrange for a quiet retirement in house arrest.
translation: 安排其秘密退休并软禁。

original: A reprimand. Biased advice is still advice.
translation: 稍作谴责。有偏见的建议也是建议。

original: Wily Smugglers
translation: 奸诈的走私犯

original: Smuggling is an activity even the most simple-minded can decide to pursue - the only difference is that they get caught. More worrying are those with genuine talent in knowing who to bribe and what lies to tell to elude capture, and as smuggling becomes more profitable, these tend to grow in numbers.\n\nWe have been on the trail of a particularly clever band of smugglers recently, and the network of deceit they have managed to create to continue their operations continues to surprise us. How should we go about resolving this?
translation: 哪怕头脑最简单的人也能进行走私——唯一的区别就是他们会被抓获。真正令人担忧的是那些知道该贿赂谁、该以怎样的谎言躲避抓捕的人，而在走私所获利益越来越高的当今，这类人的人数越来越多。\n\n我们近期追踪到了一个极为狡猾的走私团伙，他们所建立的诈骗网络尤使我们震惊。我们该怎么处理这个情况？

original: Send our best men to track down their collaborators.
translation: 派出最好的手下去抓捕其同伙。

original: Send an agent to recruit them as spies.
translation: 令特派员前去招募他们成为我国间谍。

original: Ignore them for the time being.
translation: 现在暂时无视他们。

original: [culture_province.Culture.GetName] Community Distrusts Us
translation: [culture_province.Culture.GetName]群体不信任我们

original: [Root.GetName] may not house the most egregious liars and traitors in the world, but compared to some other countries, our people do tend to be a bit more easily bribed into abusing their authority. Most of the [Root.Owner.GetAdjective] population accepts the difficulties and, to the dishonest, occasional benefits this brings.\n\nThe [culture_province.Culture.GetName] people in [culture_province.GetName] see things differently. They lament this state of things as a consequence of letting the easily corrupted [Root.Culture.GetName] people rule the nation, claiming that the country ruled by their own people doesn't suffer the same fate. Some of them are suggesting that they would be better off seceding.
translation: [Root.GetName]可能不是最恶劣的骗子和叛徒的聚集地，但相较于其他国家，我国的人更容易被收买并滥用权力。大部分[Root.Owner.GetAdjective]群众都接受这个事实，并且对于不那么老实的人，偶尔还会从中获利。\n\n但是[culture_province.GetName]的[culture_province.Culture.GetName]人却不这么看。他们哀叹这是让容易腐败的[Root.Culture.GetName]人管辖国家的后果，并宣称如果让他们来所治理国家就不会如此。他们中的一些人还宣称独立出去会更好。

original: Apologize for our failure and promise to improve.
translation: 为我们的失败而道歉并保证会改善。

original: Reject this as uneducated prejudice.
translation: 将这当做没有教养的偏见驳回。

original: Corrupt Ambassador
translation: 腐败的大使

original: Our representatives to other countries should represent our very best people, but unfortunately, this is not always the case. Sometimes people are given posts as ambassadors because the administration wants them far away, and at worst, there is good reason for this.\n\nAs it turns out, one such ambassador has spent his well-paid exile further enriching himself with bribes. While this is not exactly improving our reputation with the locals, he has maintained important connections here at home and will not be dismissed without causing some trouble.
translation: 我们派驻别国的使节理应展露我国优秀才俊的风采，但常常事与愿违。有时，某些人出任大使只因中央希望“放逐”他们，而此举又确乎合于情理。\n\n东窗事发矣，现在就有这样一位大使利用自己的高薪“流放之路”，通过受贿为自己谋得更多利益。尽管他的所作所为这完全不能提升我们在当地人中的声誉，但迫于他与国内一些势力的密切联系，我们不能无故将其罢黜。

original: He has caused more trouble where he is. Get rid of him.
translation: 他已经造成够大的麻烦了，让他滚。

original: They'll have to get used to it.
translation: 他们必须要习惯这一点。

original: [trade_goods_province.GetTradeGoodsName] 'Disappearing'
translation: [trade_goods_province.GetTradeGoodsName]「失踪」

original: With corruption ever on the rise in [Root.GetName], an increasing amount of [trade_goods_province.GetTradeGoodsName] has been disappearing from our legitimate trade networks onto the black market. While some blame too restrictive regulations and tariffs, part of the problem is clearly that these crimes are simply too easy to get away with. When silence is easily bought, secrets are easy to keep, and those secrets are growing more and more costly for [Root.GetName].
translation: 随着[Root.GetName]内部的腐败日益增长，越来越多的[trade_goods_province.GetTradeGoodsName]正从我国的正规交易渠道流向黑市。有些人将此事归咎于过于严格的规范限制和关税，而另一部分问题所在显然是这些罪行能够过于轻易地逃脱惩罚。当封口变得越来越容易，秘密越来越方便保护时，这些问题的代价对[Root.GetName]来说只会越变越高。

original: We must regain control of the [trade_goods_province.GetTradeGoodsName] market.
translation: 我们必须重新获得[trade_goods_province.GetTradeGoodsName]市场控制权。

original: Corrupt Generals
translation: 腐败的陆军将领

original: Military experience and expertise should be the main, if not only, factors influencing who rises through the ranks of the [Root.GetAdjective] army. As our society grew more and more corrupt, practices drew further and further away from this ideal. The reality today is that a position as general carries a lot of prestige, and those with money or connections are more than willing to use them to secure such a position. With the existing leadership being easily influenced with these tools, they can.\n\nFrom time to time, someone may rise through the ranks who have actually earned their title, but many of the finest minds in strategic matters will never have a chance to lend their skills to us.
translation: 军旅经验和专业知识应当是判断[Root.GetAdjective]军中谁应当晋升的主要——或许不是唯一——的判定标准。由于我们的社会腐败状况日益恶化，使得现实情况与理论的差距越来越大。如今的实际状况是当上将领能带来极大威望，而那些有钱或关系的人更愿意用这些方式来确保其位。在现今军中领导阶层极易受其影响的情况下，这不难。\n\n偶尔会有些出自行伍的人能够获得一席之地，但许多最优秀的战略家永远不会有机会展现他们的才能。

original: Such an unjust world.
translation: 如此不公的世界。

original: Corrupt Admirals
translation: 腐败的海军将领

original: Those who command our ships in battle or are sent to explore lands to be claimed by the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should be chosen from the bravest and wisest in our navy. This is not the case today. From their very first day on a ship, sailors see money illicitly changing hands and protocol being broken as a matter of course, and quickly learn that both the letter and the spirit of the law carry little weight in [Root.GetName] when silver is put on the other pan of the scales.\n\nThose who do not learn quickly make enemies. To advance through the ranks of the [Root.GetAdjective] navy, you need to learn to play this system, and those who rise to the top are rarely those we wished would be there.
translation: 那些指挥我国舰船作战，或是前去为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]寻找未知大陆的人本应选自于最勇敢和睿智的海军将士之中，但现如今却不是这样。在水手们头一天登舰时，他们就会看到经费被挥霍一空、条例被弃若敝履堪称稀松平常，随后便会很快地意识到对[Root.GetName]来说规则条例和律法精神跟金钱相比完全不值一提。\n\n而那些不同流合污的人则会立刻成为公敌。要想在[Root.GetAdjective]混得开，你就必须学着这套规矩做事，并且那些爬到了顶的人大多不是我们希望看到身居其位的人。

original: No wonder we have mutinies.
translation: 怪不得我们海军总发生哗变。

original: Foreign Merchants Distrust Us
translation: 外国商人不信任我们

original: Every trader tries to cut a deal that will be to their benefit, and many are willing to bend the truth a little to succeed. While this is expected, merchants from [Root.GetName] have a reputation abroad that goes beyond this into outright lies and fraud. The corruption which has become a part of how we do business can be shocking to outsiders, which has led to traders worldwide choosing to avoid us when possible.\n\nIt's too late to do anything about our present image, as the damage is already done, but perhaps we can stop this from reoccurring if we stamp out the casual corruption in our society.
translation: 任何商人都希望达成能让他们获利的协议，而且很多人也都愿意稍稍歪曲一下事实以达到目标。尽管已有预料，但[Root.GetName]商人的所作所为早已名声在外，他们做得太过分甚至已经演变成了全然的虚假与谎言。已成为我们行商方式一部分的腐败贿赂令外国人感到震惊，使得全世界的商人都尽可能地避免与我们交易。\n\n现如今事态已然如此，任何试图弥补我们商贸形象的努力都已经太迟了，但如果我们能清除社会中的腐败分子，或许能够防止此类事件再次发生。

original: We're not dishonest, just pragmatic!
translation: 我们并非不诚信，我们只是务实！

original: Governmental Functions Breaking Down
translation: 政府机能崩溃

original: A corrupt administration operates less to sustain itself and more to sustain its members. Consequently, as it begins to fall apart, the immediate reaction of most officials is not to save what they all stand to lose, but to grab what they can while it lasts.\n\n[Root.GetName] may not be on its way to a complete collapse, but the severe corruption reaching all the way from the lowest clerk to those closest to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has corroded several crucial governmental functions, leading to a widespread destabilization of the country. This has been a long time coming and we all pay the price.
translation: 一个腐败的行政系统，其日常运作很少出于维护自身的目的，而大多是为其成员谋利。作为后果，当整个系统开始崩溃时，大多数官员的反应不是试图挽救而是尽可能多地争取利益。\n\n[Root.GetName]也许还没到完全分崩离析的时候，但从基层到[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的身边之人都遍布着严重的腐败，这已然腐蚀了许多重要政府部门的运转，导致了全国性的动荡和混乱。这问题已经持续很久了，我们都将为此付出代价。

original: This cannot be allowed to continue.
translation: 这不能再继续下去了。

original: Mercenaries Extorting Locals
translation: 佣兵勒索当地民众

original: During wartime, soldiers of fortune often find ways to make it home with a bit more than they are paid by raiding the land where they are sent to fight. Normally, this is not a problem for us when they are sent abroad to terrorize our enemies, but sometimes this habit is hard to break, even during peacetime. Some farmers and travelers in [Root.GetName] have complained that mercenaries stationed here have been robbing and extorting them, despite - or perhaps because of - the fact that there isn't even a war ongoing.\n\nMeddling in the ranks of mercenaries, even ones that we hired, is always a difficult matter. Their accusers are unlikely to take the matter further if we let it slide, but the question remains how our society will change if we allow it to continue.
translation: 战争期间，雇佣兵们经常会选择到防区左近的地区进行掠夺，如此一来便能带着比合约上更多的收入归乡。平时这倒不是什么问题，毕竟佣兵们常常被派往国外威慑敌人，但有些时候习惯是难以压制的，哪怕是在和平时期。一些[Root.GetName]的农民和旅行者抱怨说驻扎此地的佣兵一直在抢劫和勒索他们，即便那里根本就没有战事——这大概也是原因所在。\n\n插手雇佣军队伍的管理，即使是管理那些我们雇佣的佣兵，也一直是件难事。如果我们就这么让这件事过去，原告们很可能也会就此罢休；但问题是，如果我们置之不顾的话，我们的社会状况会变成什么样。

original: Purge the mercenary ranks of such thugs.
translation: 把这些无赖佣兵都清理了。

original: It's part of the price our country pays for their service.
translation: 这是我们付给他们的报酬之一。

original: Incompetent Administrator
translation: 不称职的行政官员

original: Matters of governmental organization have never been [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s strong suit. What a good leader does to compensate for such a known weakness is to delegate and this is exactly what our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has done, but the people who have handled administration in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] stead have proven to be more competent than honest. The government runs well enough, but tends to slowly shift its priorities towards matters which the benefactors of these irreplaceable officials find to be of importance.\n\nWith [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] unable to fully grasp the intricacies of the matters in question, the guilty parties cannot easily be seen or removed from office. For now, we'll simply have to suffer the consequences.
translation: 处理政府组织相关的事务从来都不是[Root.Monarch.GetName]的长处。一个优秀的领导者弥补此类弱项的方法便是委任他人，而我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]也正是这么做的；只不过替代[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]位置的行政官员们显然都是些有才无德之辈。政府运作的情况确实很好，但行政事务的侧重点却开始转移，慢慢偏向了这群重要官员的恩主们所利益相关的方向。\n\n由于[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]无法完全掌控这些错综复杂的事务，我们很难看住这群不法之徒或者将他们撤职。就目前来说，我们只能忍耐这些事情。

original: Unfortunate that skill and honor do not always go hand in hand.
translation: 不幸的是才能和信誉并不总是相伴。

original: Overextension Exploited
translation: 过度扩张

original: The rapid expansion of the [Root.GetAdjective] borders is most fortunate, but brings with it new administrative challenges. As every person familiar with the optimistic language knows, "challenges" is the sweeter-tasting word for "problems". Our country has not fully adjusted to its new extent yet, and people who have noticed the confusion and poorly enforced law in these new acquisitions are reaping the benefits.\n\nThis lawlessness may eventually pass, but the temporary administrations appear to have built an unstable foundation for the future. It will take time and money to rid our society from the distrust forming in the present situation.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]疆域的急速扩张确实是交了好运，但这也带来了更多行政方面的挑战。每个熟知语言艺术的人都知道，「挑战」只不过是用更好听的方式表述「麻烦」罢了。我国还没做好管理其新疆域的调整和准备，而注意到这些地区的混乱以及律令废弛之处的人正趁机大肆牟利。\n\n这一乱无法纪的状况总会结束，但临时行政管理所打下的基础可能并不稳定且有碍未来发展。现在的形势下，想摆脱当地社会的不信任需要花费大量时间和金钱。

original: We'll have to adapt as best we can.
translation: 我们必须尽可能地去适应。

original: $TRADER$ Has Corrupt Connections
translation: $TRADER$与腐败关联

original: We try to keep our administration free of dishonest individuals, but we cannot always account for the friends and contacts which got them to where they are. $TRADER$ has unfortunately turned out to be a good example of the problems that follow from this, being skilled and personable but somewhat gullible in $TRADER_POSS_PRONOUN$ choice of associates.\n\nRecent investigations have revealed that much of our well-built trade network relies on bribes, smuggling, and other dubious activities to reach its current level of efficiency. $TRADER$ claims to have known nothing of this, which is likely true. Nevertheless, if we decide to expose and end this, the responsibility will be $TRADER_POSS_PRONOUN$ to take.
translation: 我们试图避免不诚信之辈进入行政系统，但我们可没办法一直盯着那些可能会引人误入歧途的朋友和圈子。$TRADER$则不幸地成为了一个实例，尽管他能力出众且风度翩翩，但在选择$TRADER_POSS_PRONOUN$合作者时却多少有些过于轻信他人。\n\n近期的调查表明，我国的许多构建良好的贸易网络事实上是依赖于贿赂、走私和其他的可疑活动才达到了如今的效率。而$TRADER$则宣称自己对此毫不知情——这话倒确实很可能是真的。无论如何，如果我们决定揭露并解决这个问题，责任无疑是$TRADER_POSS_PRONOUN$。

original: Failure to see through lies is also a failure.
translation: 未能看穿谎言亦属无能。

original: If it works, it works.
translation: 能用就行。

original: Bribes Growing More Accepted
translation: 贿赂泛滥

original: 'What is the difference between an honest man and a fool? The fool doesn't know he is being swindled.'\n\nSo goes an increasingly common saying in [Root.GetName], the spirit of which is proven through a more sinister change in the social fabric. Bribes are beginning to be seen as a natural consequence of the market, where any action carries a price. Those who refuse to take bribes are viewed as precisely what the saying suggests: fools. Worse than fools, since they are deliberately refusing money that could be theirs. The consequence of this cynicism is that any form of power truly corrupts, and no one who believes it is immune. Not even the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: “一个诚实的人和一个傻子有什么区别？傻子不会知道自己被骗了。”\n\n这是一句在[Root.GetName]日益广为流传的谚语，而社会氛围变得愈发险恶更是证明了这种思想的真实性。贿赂渐渐变成了市场中的常态，所有事情都明码标价，拒绝受贿的人完全成为了那句俗语中的“傻子”——甚至比傻子更蠢，毕竟他们居然拒绝了快到手的钱。此等犬儒主义的结果便是所有形式的权力都会完全腐化，任何相信这句俗语的人都无法幸免。甚至连[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]都不行。

original: It's still just a saying.
translation: 那还只是句俗语。

original: Corrupt Ambassador
translation: 腐败的大使

original: King of the Hill
translation: 山丘之王

original: Soldiers from a certain state are causing problems among the League's armed forces, refusing to honor requests from cities with which they have long-standing feuds. This has escalated into an informal power struggle within the military, for nothing but prestige and bragging rights, which could have consequences for morale.
translation: 来自某国的士兵正在联盟军中生事，他们拒绝执行来自与他们长期对抗的城邦的请求。这已然演变为军队内部非正式的权力斗争，而其目的只不过是为了耀武扬威。这很可能会对士气造成影响。

original: Have the troublemakers taste the whip, publicly.
translation: 让这些闹事的尝尝什么叫做军法示众。

original: Boys will be boys.
translation: 毕竟只是些年轻人。

original: The Rich Get Richer
translation: 富人更富

original: Some of the most successful merchants have been found to circumvent tariffs and League taxations by registering holdings under subordinate captains or by unregulated trade with foreign powers. While we still gain enough from them to make a profit, they're setting a bad example and many lesser merchants are likely to follow the practices if left unchecked.
translation: 根据近来的曝光，一些顶级的成功商人通过将财产登记到属下的船长名下，或是与海外势力进行非正规的贸易，借此来规避关税和联盟税务。尽管我们从他们手中获取了足够的收入，但毕竟是个很糟糕的示范，若是放任不管的话，很多身家少些的商人肯定也会有样学样。

original: These titans of trade can be granted some leeway, lest we risk losing them.
translation: 我们可以给这些贸易巨头一些自由，这总比失去他们好。

original: Everyone is equal before the law!
translation: 法律面前人人平等！

original: A Secret to Fast Travels
translation: 快捷的秘道

original: Overland transport of perishable goods is a hazardous enterprise, reliant on well-guarded routes. From a foreign contact you've learned of the location of a hidden path, allowing you to cut the time of certain transports by half. This could benefit all trade in the region, but could also be a terrific boon to yourself, should you choose not to share it.
translation: 易逝品的陆上运输是门风险极大的生意，完全依赖于悉心护卫的商路。你从某个外国线人处得到了关于某条隐秘小道的信息，这条小道能够使一些运输线路的耗时减半。这条小道对整个区域的贸易都有所帮助，但如果你选择不将其共享的话，会给你自己带来巨大的利益。

original: Competition breeds excellence.
translation: 竞争孕育卓越。

original: Sharing is caring.
translation: 分享即是关心。

original: Pirates Smell Booty
translation: 海盗闻风而动

original: Pirate and privateer raids have steadily increased in accordance with our profitability. Steps need to be taken to halt this escalation of seaborne robbery.
translation: 海盗及私掠者的袭击事件随着我们收益的增长而与日俱增。我们必须采取行动制止这种海上劫掠的问题。

original: Procure additional escorts.
translation: 派出额外的护航舰队。

original: Invest in an effort to hunt the dogs down.
translation: 花费精力清除这些豺狼。

original: Use a spy to infiltrate the largest pirate organization.
translation: 派遣间谍渗透进最大的海盗组织中。

original: Is A Pirate in Hand Worth Ten in the Gallows?
translation: 一个被抓的海盗比十个吊死的更有用？

original: A pirate has been caught and is willing to trade information about the extensive criminal organization he is working for in exchange for a pardon.
translation: 一名海盗被捕了，他请求我们的赦免，并愿意供述出他效力的那个规模庞大的犯罪组织的情报作为交换。

original: Grant the bargain and use it to catch the bigger fish.
translation: 批准这项交易，准备钓条大鱼。

original: Show everyone what fate has in store for pirates!
translation: 让所有人看到海盗应得的惩罚是什么样的！

original: Pirates for Everyone
translation: 海盗受伏

original: The diligent actions of our navy have borne fruit. We've cornered and captured the leaders of the largest band of naval bandits plaguing our trade. While death by hanging is traditional, there might also be more lucrative ways to capitalize on the victory.
translation: 我国海军的勤奋努力终于得到了回报。我们设法困住并抓捕了袭击我国贸易的最大海盗团体的头领。虽然吊死海盗是个传统，但换一种方式的话，这场胜利或许能带来更大的好处。

original: Enlist them as privateers.
translation: 将其作为私掠者收编。

original: All pirates must hang!
translation: 所有海盗都要吊死！

original: Ripe Lumber
translation: 成熟的木材

original: An enterprising merchant has come across a huge shipment of unprocessed lumber at a very low price. While we could use the materials for our ships, there is the matter of their uncertain origins and whether the quality can be assured.
translation: 一名有魄力的商人偶然以白菜价收购了一大批原木。虽然我们可以将其用于制造舰船，但鉴于我们并不确定这批木材的来源，其质量无法得到保证。

original: If it floats, build boats!
translation: 能浮起来就能用来造船！

original: Sell it before it becomes worthless.
translation: 趁着还值钱赶紧卖掉。

original: Let's Make War Our Business
translation: 统一战线

original: Their enmity with a common rival unites several League members, and there is increased pressure from these states to assemble a common front towards this foe.
translation: 对某个共同宿敌的仇恨使得联盟内的一些成员聚集了起来，这些邦国也开始施压，试图组建起针对这一公敌的共同阵线。

original: The enemy of my friend is my enemy.
translation: 我朋友的敌人就是我的敌人。

original: We have subtler weapons at our disposal.
translation: 我们有些巧妙的武器可以利用。

original: Private squabbles do not dictate League policy.
translation: 私下争斗不该影响联盟政策。

original: Envy Leads to Anger
translation: 嫉妒导致的愤恨

original: We've received reports of ostracization and outright harassment of League merchants in a major trade city. Local merchants are accusing us of monopolizing trade, and are taking drastic measures.
translation: 我们收到报告称某个主要贸易城市排斥并公然袭扰联盟商人。当地商人指控我们垄断贸易并打算采取一些激进的措施。

original: Demand compensation from the local authorities!
translation: 要求当地政府赔偿！

original: Let them see if they can do without us.
translation: 看看没有我们的商人，他们能否成事。

original: Our representatives must learn to fend for themselves.
translation: 我们的代表必须学会保护自己。

original: Intraleague Friction
translation: 联盟内部摩擦

original: Two member cities of the League have a bloody history, but have until recently kept a lid on outright hostilities for the sake of League stability. The last year has seen the conflict rekindled, however, and cooperation between people from the different regions is becoming difficult.
translation: 联盟成员中的两个城邦有着血海深仇，只是为了保持联盟的稳定所以一直没有彻底翻脸。然而，两国在去年重燃战火，使得不同地区的合作变得越来越困难。

original: Side with one party.
translation: 支持一方。

original: Side with the other party.
translation: 支持另一方。

original: If they cannot let go of their past, they need to resolve it on their own.
translation: 如果他们无法对过去释怀，那就自己解决吧。

original: Papers, Please!
translation: 请使用票据！

original: A system where currency is measured in writing rather than coin promises to revolutionize the trade industry. Among the benefits are additional cargo space and a lessened incentive for pirates and robbers to ply their bloody trade. Whether this practice will remain inviolate to corruption and human error remains to be seen, though.
translation: 一个以记账而非货币交易的方式运行的现金流系统将给贸易行业带来一场革命。好处之一就是能够腾出额外的货舱空间，此外还能削弱海盗和劫匪们抢劫的积极性。不过，这种做法是否经得住腐败和人为失误的考验还不得而知。

original: We need every edge we can get.
translation: 我们需要一切有利于我们的东西。

original: If it ain't broke...
translation: 如果它不崩溃的话……

original: No More Papers, Please!
translation: 拒绝票据！

original: Increasing use of bills of exchange and careful bookkeeping have produced many of the gains predicted. The practice comes with its own problems, however, as forgeries and audit frauds are running rampant.
translation: 愈发频繁的汇票支付及谨慎的账务簿记确实给我们带来了预期的巨额收益。然而，这个系统的实际应用也存在着独有的问题，伪造和审计欺诈的行为正日益猖獗。

original: This is unacceptable. We should go back to silver.
translation: 这不可接受。我们应该回归现金结算。

original: Mere teething problems. We will stay the course.
translation: 一点小问题罢了。我们要继续。

original: Naval Envy
translation: 海军攀比

original: Despite our considerable mercantile success, we are not regarded as a serious power by many nations. If they won't respect wealth, maybe a massive warship will bring the respect we deserve.
translation: 尽管我们在商业方面成就卓越，我们并没有被许多国家视为一个强国。如果他们不尊重我们的钱，或许一艘巨大的战舰会让他们改变主意。

original: By God, it will be glorious!
translation: 天啊，这一定会是一艘传奇战舰！

original: We will not play their game.
translation: 我们可不掺和他们那一套。

original: Spiritual Concerns
translation: 宗教问题的关注

original: A papal envoy expresses concern for the religious unity of the League, with protestant and reformist sentiments running unchecked among members. He suggests letting the church send a religious advisor to oversee and report on the spiritual state of the League.
translation: 鉴于联盟内的新教和改革宗观点可谓是畅通无阻，一位教宗特使对联盟内的宗教统一问题表达了关切。他建议由教会派出一位顾问来监督并报告联盟内的宗教状况。

original: Best not to anger the church.
translation: 最好别触怒教会。

original: We answer to no one but the Free Market!
translation: 我们只以自由市场为纲！

original: Punished Soldiers
translation: 士兵受惩罚

original: Shared Trade Secrets
translation: 共享贸易机密

original: League Encouraged Embargo
translation: 联盟支持禁运

original: Demanded Compensation
translation: 要求补偿

original: Sided With Us
translation: 支持我方

original: Sided Against Us
translation: 反对我方

original: Refused to Take Sides
translation: 拒绝声明支持任何一方

original: Allowed Papal Advisor in League
translation: 允许教宗顾问来到联盟

original: Half the Loyalty, Double the Agent
translation: 忠奸莫辨的双面间谍

original: Espionage may be the hardest test there is for loyalty to one's country. Both fear and temptations surround spies constantly, and the better they are at what they do, the more certain they are to face them. These temptations, of course, are something we are more than willing to provide foreign agents.\n\nAn agent from a country where corruption is rampant has recently decided to give in to one of these temptations. Eager to make a bigger profit than most can hope to earn through bribes, he has offered to act as a double agent for us. However, the 'anonymous' method of contact he chose has turned out to be less anonymous than expected, so we now know his name. How shall we proceed?
translation: 间谍活动也许是对国家忠诚的最难考验。恐惧和诱惑时常围绕着每一位间谍，越是擅长其工作，越是无法回避面对这些问题。这些诱惑，当然，我们更情愿提供给外国间谍。\n\n一位来自腐败猖獗之国的间谍近期选择接受诱惑。相比大多数人希望的受贿方式，他渴望着获得更大的利润，故而提出作为我们的双面间谍。然而，其“匿名”的联络方式显然没有预期那样有效。我们已经知道他的名字了。我们该怎么处理？

original: Accept the offer for a lesser sum and spare his life.
translation: 接受条件但降低价格并宽恕他的性命。

original: Shadow him for a few days before he has an accident.
translation: 让他在出“事故”之前隐蔽几天。

original: Second Chance for a Traitor
translation: 叛徒的第二次机会

original: We are more than aware of the corruption plaguing [Root.GetAdjective] society, but we had at least hoped that it didn't go beyond money changing hands between our own citizens. We were wrong. Associates of an agent maintaining our spy network in [From.GetName] have proven recently that he has accepted a sum of money that could only have come from the [From.GetAdjective] government. We have to accept that one of our best was not as loyal as we hoped.\n\nSome say that this operation may be salvaged yet. If confronted with evidence of his betrayal, he might be ready to switch back to his original allegiance - with the added benefit of having the trust of the [From.GetAdjective]. Is it worth the risk?
translation: 我们已然注意到[Root.GetAdjective]社会中的腐败问题，但是至少，我们希望它只停留在我们自己人之间的利益交换中。我们错了。某个维持着在[From.GetName]的间谍网的间谍被其同事证实近期他接受了一份只可能是来自[From.GetAdjective]政府的大额贿赂金。我们必须接受一位优秀间谍并不如我们所想得那般忠诚的事实。\n\n有人指出此事尚有挽回余地。向他出示他叛国的证据，这位密探也许会重归旧主——且额外获得了[From.GetAdjective]信任。值得冒这个险吗？

original: He'll be even more valuable to us now.
translation: 他现在更有价值了。

original: He has done enough damage already. Invite him home for the last time.
translation: 他已经造成足够大的损失了，让他回家做个了结吧。

original: Twice the Traitor?
translation: 二次叛变？

original: The difficult thing about relying on people of low character is that they have rarely been swayed for the last time. The [From.GetAdjective] spy we offered a large sum of money and our mercy for turning double agent against his country seems to have been discovered by those he betrayed. Our other spies report that he was offered to continue working for both nations, but with his true allegiance shifted back to his home country.\n\nThat the offer has been made, there can be no doubt about. His coming out of it alive means he must have, at the very least, pretended to accept. Despite this, he may still be working for us and could only be handing token information to the enemy. Can we afford to take our chances?
translation: 任用背德之人的麻烦在于他们几乎不会只背叛一次。那个[From.GetAdjective]间谍，那个我们提供了大量金钱和仁慈让他转换立场对抗他的母国的双面间谍，似乎已被他背叛之人发现了。我国其他密探指出他被要求继续同时为两边工作，只是重新忠于他的母国。\n\n这个要求已被下达，此事毫无疑问。他仍然活着，证明他一定——至少是——装作接受了。尽管如此，他仍能为我们工作，只是会将口令信息交给敌国。我们能承担这个风险吗？

original: This is getting ridiculous, and so is the notion of trusting him.
translation: 这越来越荒唐了，决定相信他也是荒谬无比。

original: If the agent is now loyal to [From.GetName]:
translation: 如果该间谍现忠于[From.GetName]：

original: If the agent is still loyal to us:
translation: 如果该间谍仍忠于我们：

original: He fooled them again? He's pretty good.
translation: 他又一次愚弄了他们？那可真厉害。

original: Seal of Confession
translation: 忏悔印章

original: Religious institutions are considered sacrosanct and above the petty plots and schemes of countries and spies. This is why it's crucial to infiltrate them. Many secrets that would never be spoken aloud are told in confidence to religious authorities, which the practice of confession has even turned into an institution.\n\nA church in one of the countries we have focused our espionage efforts on has presented an unprecedented opportunity to exploit this. One of our loyal agents, posing as a nun in a local convent, has found that she can overhear the conversations from confessionals while doing chores in the church. While she is likely to escape detection, the plan would outrage religious authorities if discovered. Is it worth taking our chances?
translation: 宗教机构被认为是神圣而不可侵犯的，且高于一切国家和间谍们无足轻重的阴谋诡计。这便是为什么渗透其中如此重要。许多不会被公开的秘密都会被告知受信任的宗教权威，使得忏悔之事已然成为一种行政机构事务。\n\n在我们进行间谍活动的一个国家中，有个教会为我们提供了一个绝佳的机会。一位忠诚的密探，伪装成当地修道院中的一个修女，发觉她可以在处理日常事务中听到许多忏悔中的秘密对话。虽然她可能可以全身而退，但此事一旦暴露则不免会触怒宗教权威。我们应该冒这个险吗？

original: Their sins may be of interest, even if we can't absolve them...
translation: 他们的罪愆是可利用的，尽管我们不能帮他们开脱...

original: Unthinkable! She should inform the priests that they can be heard.
translation: 难以置信！她应该告知牧师们他们的对话泄露了。

original: Pope Discovers Plot
translation: 教宗发现阴谋

original: Our plan to use information from confessionals to improve our intelligence gathering in a foreign country has resulted in a diplomatic disaster with the Papacy, as our agent was discovered a few months into the operation. Facing the wrath of the church, she has since disappeared from the convent along with her belongings; whether this is her own doing or the actions of the enemy, we may never know.\n\nWe can be certain, however, that the church found out enough to realized we were behind what happened. The Pope is shocked that we would exploit the church and its practices in this way. The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] enjoys some plausible deniability, but the country's standing is still irreversibly harmed.
translation: 我们借用忏悔时收集的信息来增强收集外国情报能力的方案演变成了与教宗间的外交灾难，我们的密探被发现有数月参与其中。面对教廷的盛怒，她带着随身物品从修道院消失了；我们无法得知究竟是她自己逃离了或是敌国之举。\n\n但有一点是实际确定的，教廷已经得到足够信息发觉我们是幕后主使。教宗对我们利用教会进行如此之事的举动而震惊。虽然[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]作了合理推诿，但国家的形象不可逆地受到损害。

original: Is it too late to ask for forgiveness?
translation: 现在要求宽恕是不是太晚了？

original: Opportunity to End a Reign
translation: 结束其统治的机会

original: Many who work with international politics have wished that a head of state could be swiftly replaced, preferably by separating said head from its shoulders. Making it happen is not as easy. The damage regicide can do to a nation is well-known and many nations treat their government security as a game of chess, where protecting the king is a priority above all.\n\nIf the world truly was a chessboard, we'd currently have our opponent in check. Our extraordinary espionage network abroad has given us an opportunity to end the life of a foreign leader. Once the deed is done, they will likely be able to trace it to us, but by then it will be too late.
translation: 许多做国际政治工作的人都曾希望过能迅速替换掉一位政府首脑，最好让他的脑袋和肩膀分家。想达到这一点可不容易。弑君之举对一个国家的损伤众所周知，而许多国家将其政府安保问题视作棋局——保护君王是最重要的。\n\n如果世界真的是个棋盘，那我们如今已经将了敌国一军。我们卓越的间谍网络为我们提供了一个结束外国领导人性命的绝佳机会。一旦事情结束，他们可能会追寻踪迹到我们身上，但那便为时已晚。

original: Give the order.
translation: 下命令。

original: There must be a better way to use these connections.
translation: 应该还有更好的利用这些间谍网络途径。

original: Regicide!
translation: 弑君！

original: [From.GetAdjective] assassins, using what must have been an impressive network of contacts, have committed that most unspeakable of international violations of trust: they have murdered our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Although the culprit has been caught, those who ordered the murder are most likely safe in [From.GetName], prepared to continue inflicting their schemes upon our nation. Once the government has recovered from the shock, we must think of a way to strike against these enemies of [Root.GetName].
translation: [From.GetAdjective]的刺客凭借着庞大的联络网，进行了最难以令人接受的违反国际互信关系的举动：他们谋杀了我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。 虽然凶手已经被捕，但那些发号施令进行谋杀的指使者仍安全地待在[From.GetName]，并着手继续对我国施加影响。一旦我们的政府从所受打击中恢复，我们必须开始准备还击[Root.GetName]的方法。

original: Such a dishonorable blow!
translation: 如此卑鄙的一击！

original: $SPYMASTER$ Suspects Neighbors
translation: $SPYMASTER$怀疑邻国

original: Having a spymaster in our employ has mainly contributed to our intelligence gathering abroad, but $SPYMASTER$ sometimes coordinates counterespionage as well. Recently, $SPYMASTER_POSS_PRONOUN$ investigations have uncovered a conspiracy that could only be the work of one of our neighboring countries. Which neighbor is behind it remains unclear, but the constant exchanges of information would require those behind it to be close by.\n\n$SPYMASTER$ has prepared to round up and harshly question a number of foreign officials who might be involved, but conflicting theories about the culprits leaves it up to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to decide who to target. Our neighbors will probably not appreciate the accusations, but something needs to be done, and fast.
translation: 拥有一位间谍总管对海外情报收集有着不小贡献，但$SPYMASTER$有时也会进行反谍报行动。近来$SPYMASTER_POSS_PRONOUN$调查揭露了一个只能是由我们的邻国所致的阴谋。幕后究竟是哪国仍不得知，但持续的情报交换表明其主谋并不会过于远离情报源。\n\n$SPYMASTER$已经准备好围捕并审问可能有关的外国官员，但根据冲突理论，当由[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来决定我们的目标。我们的邻居可能不喜欢被指责，但是有些事必须得做，而且要快。

original: Of the many possible suspects, this one...
translation: 多种可能性中，也许是这个……

original: ...or this one seem the most likely.
translation: ……或者这个看起来最有可能。

original: Secrets in our Alliance
translation: 联盟中的秘密

original: Ambassadors and diplomatic envoys often double as spies, or at least informants who go beyond their duties to gather information in the country where they are supposed to do honest negotiations. This makes it less than surprising that an ambassador here in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been suspected of involvement in espionage. The challenge now lies in tactfully handling this discovery, since only a thorough cross-examination could ascertain guilt.
translation: 大使和外交特使常常也是间谍，即便不然，他们至少也是做过超出自己本职工作以外的信息收集者。这也就使得在[Root.Capital.GetName]的大使被怀疑参与间谍活动的事情并不那么令人意外。现在的问题是在只有彻底盘问才能定罪的情况下，我们该如何巧妙地处理这一问题。

original: We must get to the bottom of this. Arrest the ambassador.
translation: 我们必须展示底线。逮捕大使！

original: Send a request for him to be replaced.
translation: 要求替换掉这位大使。

original: Just try to cut him off from important affairs.
translation: 试试把他从重要事务中隔离开吧。

original: §Y50%§! chance of [spying_ambassador.Country.GetName] adding size 10 to their spy network in [Root.Country.GetName].
translation: §Y50%§!的机会使[spying_ambassador.Country.GetName]为其在[Root.Country.GetName]的间谍网络扩大10规模。

original: Ambassador Confesses
translation: 大使认罪

original: Once arrested and removed from the comfort of his station, the ambassador we suspected of being complicit in espionage quickly admitted his guilt under interrogation. What's more, his confession indicates the spy network he was part of was more far-reaching than previously suspected. While this is certainly an embarrassment for his home country, they are requesting we resolve the situation amicably by sending the ambassador home immediately.\n\nWhile it's good praxis not to kill or imprison diplomats when it can be avoided, this man has proven himself to be an enemy of our nation. More importantly, he could still have information that is of value to us. Should we let him go to smooth over the situation?
translation: 一旦被捕并离开了职位所带来的舒适生活，这位受怀疑的大使立刻向讯问者承认了自己的罪行。此外，他的供词还表明该国的间谍网络远比我们原先设想得要更为庞大。尽管这对该国来说显然是个窘迫的状况，但他们要求我国立刻将大使遣送回国以平和地解决这一问题。\n\n尽管能够避免杀死或囚禁外交官员是件好事，此人已然证实其为我国之敌。更重要的是，他可能还握着对我们有价值的信息。我们该让他回国以平息这一事态吗？

original: No. An enemy spy who buckles under pressure is a valuable source.
translation: 不，受扣押且承受巨大压力的敌国间谍是很重要的信息来源。

original: We all spy on each other. We can forgive and forget.
translation: 我们都或多或少监视他人。我们能够原谅并放下这些问题。

original: Counterintelligence Operation
translation: 反谍报行动

original: Imprisoned Ambassador
translation: 被囚禁的大使

original: £estate_loyalty $LOYALTY$ £estate_influence $INFL$ £estate_territory $TERR$
translation: £estate_loyalty£ $LOYALTY$ £estate_influence£ $INFL$ £estate_territory£ $TERR$

original: They had expected us to do more fighting.
translation: 他们期望我们多参与战斗。

original: Our reputation has been tarnished, and making
translation: 我们的名声已被玷污了，使得

translation: 在未来$YEARS|Y$年内很难接到新的单子。

translation: §Y希望雇佣遣外雇佣军团的国家§!

original: The following countries are likely to accept Condottieri offers, provided your troops have access to them:\n$LIST$
translation: 以下国家很有可能接受遣外雇佣军团的协议，前提是你的士兵可以到达该国：\n$LIST$

original: §YYou have hired Condottieri while at peace§!
translation: §Y你在和平时期雇佣了遣外雇佣军团§!

original: You are currently paying for Condottieri from:
translation: 现在你正在支付来自以下国家的遣外雇佣军团的费用：

translation: 你目前正雇佣来自以下国家的遣外雇佣军团：

translation: @$TAG$$COUNTRY$ - 每月花费$COST|Y$¤

original: §YYou have rented out Condottieri that can be pulled back§!
translation: §Y你已经租出了可撤回的遣外雇佣军团§!

original: You can now pull back your Condottieri troops from:
translation: 你现在可以将在以下国家的遣外雇佣军团撤回：

original: @$TAG$ $COUNTRY$ - $MONTHS|Y$ months
translation: @$TAG$$COUNTRY$ - $MONTHS|Y$个月

original: §YYour Condottieri clients are disappointed!§!
translation: §Y你军队的雇主很失望！§!

original: A country that pay for your troops' service expects them to participate sufficiently in their sieges and battles. If we don't do this their patience will end after:
translation: 一个为你的军队支付钱财的国家希望他们能够充分参与围城及作战，如果我们不这么做的话，他们的耐心只能持续到：

original: Rival: $VAL|%2+=$
Distance multiplier: x$VAL|Y$
translation: 距离乘数：x$VAL|Y$

original: Base speed: $VAL|Y$
translation: 基础速度：$VAL|Y$

original: Province is a Territorial Core
translation: 该省份是自治领地核心

original: Has had §YReligious Turmoil§! for 25 years
translation: 已出现持续25年的§Y宗教动乱§!

original: Coastal Raiders
translation: 沿岸劫掠者

original: Our country has a long tradition of raiding the coastlines for what it requires in the form of sailors, money and all other good things in life.
translation: 我国有着劫掠海岸线的悠久传统，这需要水手、金钱及其他生活中的美好事物。
